node.title: Veteran teacher to face off with Angus Taylor in 2022 federal election
node.alt: An older woman with short, fair hair,smiling broadly and wearing a scarf.
node.description: The Voices of Hume campaign has selectedÂ Penny Ackery to take on the Energy Minister in the seat of Hume when Australia votes next year.
node.content:
["The Voices of Hume\u00a0campaign has selected Penny Ackery, a teacher and 30-year resident of Goulburn, to take on Angus Taylor in the 2022 election.", "The 64-year-old was announced as the candidate at an event on Goulburn on Saturday after an 18-month community consultation period.", "\"It is really time for and independent to stand up and find out what their community wants and actually say, 'Well this how I vote because this what my community want me to do,'\" Mrs Ackery said.", "Mr Taylor increased his two-party-preferred margin by 2.8 per cent to 63 per cent in the 2019 election.", "But Mrs Ackery said many in the community believed Mr Taylor had stopped listening to them.", "\"People are finding that they can't always easily communicate and talk with our current representative,\" she said.", "\"He actually voted against raising the aged pension, he voted against the drought relief package in 2019, he voted against protecting our fresh water supplies,\u00a0particularly at Boorowa.\"", "Mrs Ackery said her focus would be on sustainable development, better roads, including support for the Picton bypass, reliable internet and trustworthy leaders.", "She said she had been a high school teacher for 36 yeas and wanted to ensure students had greater opportunities.", "\"I just want to make sure that all those kids that all teachers have worked and will be working with have a really good future where the government is an open democracy where the government allows them to have choices as well,\" she said.", "", "
More than 100 people attended the launch of Penny Ackery's federal election campaign in Goulburn.(Supplied: Alex Tewes)
", "
Dissatisfaction with two-party system
", "The Voices of\u00a0Hume campaign is part of growing movement modelled on the successful 2013 campaign of Cathy McGowan, who won the safe Liberal seat of Indi in regional Victoria.", "Her result was replicated by her successor, Helen Haines, and Zali Steggall, who beat Tony Abbott at the last federal election.", "Mrs Ackery said it was \"a movement to shake up the democracy\".", "\"What is exciting is that is that so many people are realising that democracy means everyone has a choice, that everyone has an opinion,\" she said.", "The broader movement has the support of Climate 200 founder and Cleantech investor Simon Holmes \u00e0 Court.", "Mr Holmes \u00e0 Court said Climate 200 was supporting candidates in strategic seats with campaigns that fit the organisation's\u00a0values of\u00a0climate action, integrity and the treatment of women.", "He\u00a0previously told the ABC his group was working with campaigns in Wentworth, North Sydney, Mackellar, Flinders, Goldstein and Kooyong.", "Mr Holmes \u00e0 Court was at Mrs Ackery's launch in Goulburn and tweeted his enthusiasm for her authenticity.", "Mrs Ackery said she was not aware of any support from Mr Holmes \u00e0 Court and that \"while overtures may have been made, nothing is set in stone\".", "
'Activists' dressed 'as independents'
", "Following the announcement of Mrs Ackery's candidacy, Mr Taylor said in a statement that he respected his constituents and did not take any election \"for granted\".", "\"People are entitled to run and I respect that,\" he said.", "\"But sadly, this is just another front for green activists to play dress up as independents, as we are seeing around the country."]
